channel.title: Expressing the Fall of Humanity with actions... (Archive - big-ass pic)
channel.description:
[b]Quite possibly the largest currently available archived piece of what used to be our glorious BM Forums:[/b][/SIZE]
I thought this would bring smiles to the faces of all those saddened by our loss. (Im only positing it here because this is where it originally was!) Enjoy! :zip:
[img]https://www.freewebs.com/lpfstuff/TheDayIWonTheInternet.jpg[/img]
